original_title: Jean Michel Jarre: Concert pour la tolérance
overview: On July 14, 1995, Jarre held a concert in front of the Eiffel Tower, celebrating the Bastille Day, UNESCO's 50th birthday and UNESCO'S proclaimed year of tolerance. 1.25 million people attended this concert, from which a laserdisc was released.
title: Jean Michel Jarre: Concert pour la tolérance
